desc: Shop at Mollys Miniatures for all things dolls house. Extremely competitive prices and low shipping costs.

layout.text:
Welcome to my online shop for 1:12 scale dolls house furniture and accessories.
Please feel free to browse my items by clicking on the sections below or go to the catologue page to view all items at once.  Prices start at just 50p.
Low flat rate postage cost - £3.50 whatever the order size (postage will be combined on orders placed on the same day).
Facebook - @mollysdollshouse
Instagram - mollysminiatures
Happy Shopping!
